short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set Weagle as the default search engine and use all the features of our Enterprise account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weagle is an innovative web browsing service, a meta-search engine that protects and safeguards all browsing data generated on corporate devices, securing your company from any form of commercial profiling or resale of sensitive data to possible competitors arising from your privacy generated on search engines.

We are an innovative search engine designed for the corporate and institutional world that protects against leaks, resale of sensitive data, data breaches, profiling derived from personal interests and purchasing habits generated on the web.

Thanks to the extension, we will be able to allow our users to set Weagle as their default search engine, thus greatly improving the user experience.

Also, Enterprise users will be able to use our awesome Adblock technology that makes impossible for the websites to detect that you are using and Adblock solution.

Weagle is based on 5 main features:

1- Power Search, is the search engine section where you have the possibility to make queries to multiple search engines, such asDuckDuck Go, Bing, Google, Yahoo, Startpages, Youtube.

2- Digital Journal is a news aggregator that allows you to save your favourite sources and display news only from your customised feed, without ads and without clickbait ads.

3- Archive, is a web content management tool, a small drive where you can create shared folders with other users, and save within these folders, articles, websites and videos.

4- Data Wallet Weagle is the security tool that allows you to manage and protect all navigation data generated on a search engine, giving the enterprise world the possibility of enabling special algorithms that delete all web surfing every 24 hours.

5- Welfare, is a section dedicated to partners and discounts, i.e. a feed where we add companies that propose discounts for the Weagle community, so as to offer Welfare to all users who use Weagle.
